profileList.title: My Profiles
profileList.premiumMessage: In the basic version, only one profile can be created. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited profiles!
profileList.deleteMessage: Do you really want to delete this profile?
profileList.premiumActivatedMsg: You now have access to all Premium features!
profileList.basicVersionMsg: You are using the free basic version.

editProfile.title: Edit Profile
editProfile.unsavedChangesMessage: Do you want to discard the changes?

premiumDialog.title: Unlock Premium
premiumDialog.description:
In the basic version, only one profile can be created.
With SwapMyContact Premium, you can create unlimited profiles.
premiumDialog.autoRenew: Subscription automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before expiry.
premiumDialog.billingIOS: Billing is through your Apple ID account. Subscriptions can be managed and cancelled in your Apple ID settings.
premiumDialog.billingAndroid: Billing is through your Google Play account. Subscriptions can be managed and cancelled in your Google Play settings.
premiumDialog.successMessage: Premium has been successfully activated. Thank you for your support!
premiumDialog.errorMessage: An error occurred during purchase. Please try again later.
